items.value: i need to get something from a friend!

Could you may help me one more time?
A friend want to give me a Present.

Unfortunately, he no longer has enough money for a train ticket. However, I have to stay here because I am waiting for a post office package!

Could you go search for him and bring me the Present?
where can i find your friend?
i got the Present from Sergio!

I am not sure about his location!
Maybe he is at the Park or at the Market?
His Name is Sergio and he is wearing a Cowboy Hat!

Good luck my friend...
Ok, i think i got the Present you want!
Okay, i will try to find Sergio!

Cool! Sergio kept his promise...
This Bong looks really wonderful.
Thank you in any case!

As a reward i have something for you...
Please bring Sergio this Special Delivery Box for me!
He will be happy and you also will get some Gifts.

You got: 1x Crowbar, 1x Special Delivery
Haha... you are freaky, will do!

you dont have the Present of Sergio!
please come back as soon you got it...
Mkay, i will find Sergio for you!
